content: Hi all. I just arrived in Copenhagen. Anyone interested in meeting up for dinner later?
I will also arrive shortly and this sounds like a great idea to me.
Me too!
Great! This is my first time in Copenhagen so I’m open to suggestions
Sure!
@Riccardo Brasca @Alex J. Best @Julius Mann (and anyone else) how does 6:30pm sound? And where?
Sounds good to me. I don't know Copenaghen but maybe @Dagur Ásgeirsson can suggest a nice area
https://warpigs.dk ?
630 works well for me. Regarding the place I have no clue but also no strong opinions
We could also just meet somewhere earlier for coffee/beer and find some place that looks reasonable for dinner.
meanwhile Im relying on Deutsche Bahn, who knows if I'll ever make it:snail:
I just spoke with @Filippo A. E. Nuccio (that does not have zulip on the phone) and he was thinking about some sort of Italian thing (?). I will let you know

Adam Topaz said:

We could also just meet somewhere earlier for coffee/beer and find some place that looks reasonable for dinner.

Also works for me. I don't have any plans and the place where I am staying is not too inviting anyway.
@Boris Kjær is the local organizer and I’m sure he can suggest a place!

It sounds like we’ll plan to meet at BRUS at around 5 (or a bit after) and decide on dinner after that:

https://maps.app.goo.gl/QsV34NkwHADBzrEG9?g_st=ic
Great, also just arrived. I'll try to be there...
Welcome to town everybody! Would have loved to join but had a family birthday all day... See you in the morning!
Doors are locked if you need to enter the building. You message here or call me on +45 40436012 if you need someone to let you in
The reception with pizza will be at the 4th floor common room in the maths department. I will guide people up there from Auditorium 10 a bit before the hour

I am in a work meeting which has overrun. I should be at the reception by 7pm; if there are people who have questions or comments for me then I'm sorry I can't get there earlier, I'll be there as soon as I can!

Dinner tonight, 6 pm, is at Madklubben Vesterbro: https://goo.gl/maps/1HSSw6EpxHVwfLDC7

I reckon people will be walking there from the department even though it takes 45min. Others might prefer taking the metro from Vibenshus runddel or ride a bike. I suggest people who wish to walk should gather in Aud 10 around 5.10pm
Apparently that's not the correct link
Vesterbrogade 6E, 1620 København, Denmark
The correct link is: https://goo.gl/maps/h1hQh3XCmwXH5vyN7
How do I make everyone get a notification?
@Dagur Ásgeirsson for future reference: @**stream** :up:
I guess by now it's a bit too late to actually ping the 43 people on this stream.

I was asked for some dinner recommendations nearby. It is kind of hard to come up with such a place with lots of seating. These are just some places I could think of.

Nice pita to grab nearby https://goo.gl/maps/hHFVAbW8ZDfzTbkx5
Burger place with some more seating https://goo.gl/maps/BwVkmH1pvSQWPcbE6
Genuine restaurant nearby https://goo.gl/maps/AyvWtDmnqqDvYsiq7
Ramen https://goo.gl/maps/GLSQfAZne46GpQRPA

You will find quite a few places if you walk to Fælledvej or Ravnsborggade and Blågårdsgade as well.
